item.title: Dask Gateway
item.description: Introduction   Dask Gateway is a service which manages Dask clusters for users. On JASMIN, it creates a Dask cluster in LOTUS, our batch computing cluster.

item.title: Slurm quick reference
item.description: Slurm Scheduler   Slurm is the job scheduler deployed on JASMIN. It allows users to submit, monitor, and control jobs on the LOTUS (CPU) and ORCHID (GPU) clusters.
